title: Get Typophile a favicon
content: It's sort of annoying to see that this site doesn't have one yet it has great one in the corner of this site already.
author: BaB

comments.content:
I have an favicon.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124025im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wierdfavicon_5638.jpg)

(From a French site with a vaguely similar name.)

-=®=-

Yesterday (when Typophile seemed completely dead), I thought I noticed that the generic favicon had become the default Drupal face. I found this slightly odd, ’cause I didn’t think Typophile was Drupal-driven.
No, Typophile is Drupal driven. I don't remember the thread off hand, but this has been discussed before.
Scroll a bit to find Zara's comment in [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023124025/http:/typophile.com/node/34646).

I noticed that too - the favicon made an April Fools appearance.

Punchcut - I also liked the previous/next thread bit of the nav, that might be something nice to implement in future upgrades.
